TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項必須實作以處理回傳事件的方法。

span.span: Defines the method ASP.NET server controls must implement to handle postback events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立擷取瀏覽器表單送出資訊的伺服器控制項，您必須實作這個介面。To create a server control that captures form submission information from the browser, you must implement this interface. 如需有關如何使用此介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information on how to use this interface, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義的自訂按鈕伺服器控制項造成回傳，擷取回傳事件使用方法及引發`Click`在伺服器上的事件。The following code example defines a custom button server control that causes postback, captures the postback event using the method, and raises a `Click` event on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: ，代表傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

span.span: A that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.

summary.span: 當類別實作時，啟用伺服器控制項以處理表單張貼至伺服器時所引發的事件。

span.span: When implemented by a class, enables a server control to process an event raised when a form is posted to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`參數`RaisePostBackEvent`之控制項的實作方法介面。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the `RaisePostBackEvent` method of the control that implements the interface. 此控制項也會呈現的 HTML 項目會導致發生回傳。This control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback to occur. 如果控制項轉譯回傳的用戶端指令碼時，傳入的引數，從指令碼`eventArgument`參數。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回傳的起因是一個簡單提交作業，`eventArgument`參數是`null`。If the postback is caused by a simple submit operation, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`. 這個方法提供許多事件 HTML 和 Web 伺服器控制項所實作的功能。This method provides the functionality for many events implemented by HTML and Web server controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義的自訂按鈕伺服器控制項造成回傳，擷取回傳事件使用方法及引發`Click`在伺服器上的事件。The following code example defines a custom button server control that causes postback, captures the postback event using the method, and raises a `Click` event on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
